Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Detroit in 1989...
Injured on 4/7/1992 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 6/14/1993 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1994, off Charlie Lea (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1994, off Wilson Alvarez (TEX)...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 5/1/1994...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1994, hitting .326 with 16 HR, 96 RBI...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1995, hitting .480 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 5/17/1996 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1996, hitting .571 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
